amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used in contravention of current U.S. law regarding the responsibilities of law enforcement authorities to carry out immigration enforcement functions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used in contravention of section 642(a) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
